import "./SingleProduct.scss"; import RelatedProducts from "./RelatedProducts/RelatedProducts" import { FaFacebookF, FaTwitter, FaInstagram, FaTelegram, FaPinterest, FaCartPlus } from "react-icons/fa" import prod from "../../assets/products/braclet-prod-2.jpg" import useFetch from "../../hooks/useFetch"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" const SingleProduct = () => { const { id } = useParams() const { data } = useFetch(`/api/products?populate=*&[filters][id]=${id}`) if (!data) return; const product = data.data[0].attributes return (
{product.title} {product.price}$ {product.desc}
- 1 +
Category: Braclet Share:
) }; export default SingleProduct;
